CustomField.formula:
TEXT(WarningNote__c) +
" (" +
LPAD(TEXT(DAY(WarningDate__c)),2,"0")&"."&LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(WarningDate__c)),2,"0")&"."&TEXT(YEAR(WarningDate__c)) +
", registrert av " + HYPERLINK("/" + WarningRegisteredBy__c, WarningRegisteredBy__r.FirstName + " " + WarningRegisteredBy__r.LastName, "_self") + ")"
CustomField.label: WarningFormattedText
